      • getLocation

        public int[] getLocation(Mazub alien)
        Description copied from interface: IFacade
        Return the current location of the given alien.
        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface IFacade
        Parameters:
        alien - The alien of which to get the location.
        Returns:
        an array, consisting of 2 integers {x, y}, that represents the coordinates of the given alien's bottom left pixel in the world.

      • getVelocity

        Specified by:
        getVelocity in interface IFacade
        Parameters:
        alien - The alien of which to get the velocity.
        Returns:
